en.name: Muni Besen Ferreira
en.profile: Highly skilled software developer with over 7 years of experience in Python, C++, C#, and JavaScript. Proven track record in developing robust web applications using Django, Flask, React and Vue.js, with expertise in PostgreSQL and SQLite, web scraping, ChatGPT integrations, and cybersecurity. Seeking opportunities to leverage my extensive experience and skills in software development and cybersecurity.

pt.name: Muni Besen Ferreira
pt.profile: Desenvolvedor de software altamente qualificado com mais de 7 anos de experiência em Python, C++, C# e JavaScript. Comprovado histórico no desenvolvimento de aplicações web robustas usando Django, Flask, React e Vue.js, com expertise em PostgreSQL e SQLite, web scraping, integrações ChatGPT e cibersegurança. Buscando oportunidades para aproveitar minha extensa experiência e habilidades em desenvolvimento de software e cibersegurança.

en.description: With over 7 years of experience as a freelancer, I have a strong background in Python, C++, C#, JavaScript, React, and Vue.js. My expertise extends to the technical aspects of cryptocurrency and blockchain technology. I am known for my excellent problem-solving abilities and strong communication skills, which complement my technical proficiency.
responsibilities: Developing robust web applications using Django, Flask, React, and Vue.js
Implementing and maintaining backend systems with PostgreSQL and SQLite
Conducting web scraping projects to gather and analyze data
Integrating ChatGPT API for automating user interactions
Leading small teams and mentoring junior and plain members
en.tech_stack: Python, C#, JavaScript, Vue.js, React, Django, PostgreSQL, SQLite, SQL, Selenium, ChatGPT API

en.description: WebsiteCentral is a leading web solutions company, providing cutting-edge designs and innovative approaches in web technology.
responsibilities: Spearheading the development of innovative web solutions and designs
Overseeing both backend and frontend development to ensure seamless integration

Integrating cryptocurrency solutions into web applications
Leading and mentoring a team of developers to achieve project goals

en.description: At CryptoFuse.net, I pioneered a sleek cryptoswap platform using Django and JavaScript. Backed by PostgreSQL and deployed via Heroku. I've spearheaded both backend intricacies and frontend design with HTML & CSS.
responsibilities: Developing and maintaining the cryptoswap platform
Managing backend and frontend development
Deploying the platform using Heroku
Ensuring the platform's security and performance
en.tech_stack: Django, JavaScript, PostgreSQL, Heroku, HTML, CSS and crypto integration
